snippet: Morgan Stanley estimates it may have to post as much as $7.2 billion in additional collateral or termination payments to counterparties if Moody's downgrades its credit rating three notches.
abstract: Morgan Stanley estimates it may have to post as much as $7.2 billion in additional collateral or termination payments to counterparties if Moody's downgrades its credit rating three notches.

headline.main: Morgan Stanley Could Face Collateral Call
